Unique Suction Cup Design - Easy to attach and remove, the suction cup could sucked on any flat surface including desk, wall, window, back side of phone or tablet.
Built-in Microphone - Enjoying hand-free call, automatically pairs your device with the speaker when it is in range of the speaker.
Wireless Bluetooth - Compatible with Smartphones and any Bluetooth-enabled device.Perfect sound Experience, Easy button operatiom:Switching music, volume control, call answering.

Wireless Waterproof Shower Speaker, Beautifully Packaged, Ideal as a Gift for Kids, Lovers, Seniors, etc.If for any reason you're not happy with your shower speaker, Please contact us,We'll either send you a replacement or fully refund .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Music in Bathroom is always fun.
reviews.reviewText: I must say it is very high quality and great value for my money speaker. I bought this speaker for my kids bathroom and we all very impress with the sound quality. In fact I am about to order the another same speaker for our ensuite shower on the request of my better half. easy to connect and play.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am OBSESSED WITH THIS SPEAKER. I use it EVERY SINGLE TIME I get in the shower. I got it to listen to my history podcast, (American Scandal, check it out i'm OBSESSED WITH IT) and I cannot imagine getting ready without it. So good for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well, although volume control is difficult
reviews.reviewText: I use this in the shower daily, and the sound quality and Bluetooth connection are both excellent. The suction cup did not work very well for sticking the relatively heavy speaker to the glass wall of my shower, so I had to add RTV and tape it to the wall until the RTV dried. Volume control shares the same button as fast forward or rewind, and a short press on the “+” button fast forwards about 10 seconds, but a longer push increases volume by some unknown percentage. It is very easy to fast forward when you want to control volume and vice versa, and the change in volume is fairly large.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Turns shower time into accompanied karaoke time

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not worth it..keep shopping around!
reviews.reviewText: It’s not loud enough and hard to control when it comes to turning the volume up and down.It’s supposed to be waterproof but it got a lot wet in the back of the shower and now it don’t want to connect and there’s no volume.I would return it but it’s too late.I would not recommend this speaker! I’ve had a cheap 5 and Below speaker that was way better than this one. Extremely disappointed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars A few problems but overall it works
reviews.reviewText: If you’re looking for just a cheap speaker, this will do.However, the battery life isn’t very good. I have to charge it every 3 showers or so (in total no more than 3 hours of use and we turn it off in between of course).The Bluetooth will always just connect to the same phone, even if you disconnect from the device properly. No matter what, if I’m in the house and someone turns on the speaker, my phone connects and starts playing.The suction cup does not stick to anything. I’ve tried pretty much every surface in my home and the suction is garbage.It’s not super loud so if you can’t get it to stick in your shower with you, try and keep it close.All in all it works fine but had I known these things prior I would’ve just spent the money on a higher quality speaker in the first place.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Would give 10 stars if I could

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use this everyday when I shower, battery lasts a long time and the sound is great. Would 100% recommend
